title: What are the best products to buy and sell for a profit? - Quora

response.answer_text: Looking for products to sell online and make profit? If so, you are in the right place. In this article i will introduce you to 12 best things to buy and sell for profit. These are products you can easily find them on online sites and sell them through marketplaces no matter on Ebay, Amazon, Etsy, facebook or anywhere else. So, before we cut the chase let’s look at some of the factors you need to consider before you start selling.  What Factors to Consider When Choosing Items To Buy Cheap And Sell High? Choosing the right product niche is the foundation of a successful business. The ecommerce enterpreneur are keeping chasing the trends and fashion, but they are still confused about what to sell to make money. Though we can’t decide your business for you – but we can give you some ideas of best items to resell for profit, 1. Go for bestsellers On platforms such as eBay, Amazon, Chinabrands, etc. there are a host of best selling products that you can start with. Why? The demand is high which means a ready market. However, pick items according to your market preferences. 2. The product should be easy to ship Nobody wants a fragile, and huge package to ship, so select light and small items. Besides, Choose products that require less paperwork when shipping. 3. Say no to seasonal goods Seasonal products last for a short time and unfortunately the season might end without selling enough to make you profit. As such, consider timeless products to seasonal ones. Although not exhaustive, these are some of the basic factors you ought to consider before buying items to sell for profit. If you have time, there are more tips to help you find the best items to sell. Having said that, let’s look at some of the categories that sell like hotcake even without Fire sale prices. • Homeware products: Nobody don't like to make their house comfortable and beautiful. Selling homeware products online is a profitable business. YOu can sell many essential items. They include utensils, mirrors, clocks, cooking tools, kitchenware, etc. • Leisure & hobbies: It is easy to strike gold while dealing with leisure/hobby products. They include sporting tools/goods, game consoles, toys, hobbies items etc. • Fashion Minded: You can never go wrong with fashion clothes. From dresses, tops, bottoms, shoes, etc. name them. • Kid’s products: Remember how you’d cry at the store? Well, selling of toys, kids clothing, playground equipment and many more can earn you enormous profits. • For the Tech Savvy: The younger are more likely to focus on the tech products, such as keyboards, phone accessories, bluetooth earphone,etc. Below, we will go into details about the popular items you can resell for great profit easily. After reading, you will be in a position to seamlessly identify best items to buy and sell for profit. 10 Best Items To Resell For Profits You Can Buy Cheap Today Without much further ado, let’s have a closer look at these products you can sell from the comfort of your own home. 1. Video game consoles Roughly 211 million people play video games in the USA alone. What about Europe, Asia or Africa? You see, the market is huge enough. Gaming consoles and cartridges from the 70s, 80s, and 90s are some of the bestselling items. That does not mean you rule out games for recent game systems, they too sell like wildfire. Start with Atari, NES, and SNES. Where to sell: Chinabrands, eBay, Amazon, locally through Facebook, etc. Suppliers: Chinabrands 2. Drone and accessories Drones are increasingly gaining traction in different industries. From film to agriculture. As such, targeting a niche market that is drone crazy can ultimately make you huge profits. Moreover, you can sell accessories such as landing pads, batteries, bags, propellers, etc. you can seamlessly find various drones and accessories on sites such as Chinabrands. Where to sell: eBay, Amazon, etc. Suppliers: Chinabrands 3. Toys The toy industry is poised to hit $60 million by 2020. This shows that numerous persons are buying them per year. Moreover, toys and hobbies is often a “hot” sale category on Amazon. Some of the best selling toys are race cars, kitchenaware, lego, music instruments, etc. Where to sell: Amazon, eBay, etc. Suppliers: Chinabrands 4. Oil Diffuser Oil Diffuser is an awesome thing to buy and sell to make money fast. They have been a steady best-selling product and a homeware store must. The most popular type of diffuser is the beautiful, and easy to clean. Some multi-function diffuser is not only a humidifier, air freshener, but also a nightlight. Where to sell: Amazon, eBay, Facebook, etc. Suppliers: Chinabrands 5. Sunglasses With spring season with us, it is no doubt that most people are gearing up to buy sunglasses. Fortunately, all kinds of sunglasses are selling like hotcake so far. Some of the top selling are pilot, cat eye, oval, semi-rimless and shield. You can buy them on sites such as Amazon and Chinabrands. Where to sell: Amazon, and eBay Suppliers: Chinabrands 6. Makeup foldable Makeup mirror The maleup mirrors with LED is a fast-growing item recent years, and becoming a must-have product for women. Think about it. Now almost half of women will make up themselves every day. No wonder the beauty and make up items selling well on the ecommerce platform. The Led Makeup mirror is a useful and profitable item, Where to sell: locally, eBay, Instgram and similar sites Suppliers: Chinabrands 7. Sports equipment The awareness of sporting drive the the sports equipment and apparel markets. It is precticted that the sporting market will geow at a cagr of 7.1% from 2017 to 2023. The sports includes bike, outdoor, tennis, running, fitness, football and other winter sports, watersports, and others. If you can find these sports enthusiasts group and join them, you will find the steady potential customers. Where to sell: Instagram, Facebook, Amazon, etc. Suppliers: Chinabrands 8. Maxi dresses Dresses sell like hotcakes, especially the stylish maxi dresses. Every woman will want a beautiful maxi dresses in summer. Similarly, you can opt for specialty items such as plus size dresses or maternity clothing. Where to sell: Amazon, social media platforms and similar sites Suppliers: Chinabrands 9. Minimalist jewelry Minimalist jewelry are getting humongous popularity among many fashionistas and even among people who like to keep it simple, so the shops that keep good varieties of minimalist jewelry can easily get a lot of popularity and potential customers. Where to sell: Amazon, and similar sites Suppliers: Chinabrands 10. Phone lenses Nowadays, the highest percentage of photos are taken via phones. Moreover, the advent of Instagram and Snapchat has significantly increased the need for cameras. Thankfully, people are increasing using phone lenses to improve the quality of photos taken. Having said that, you can tap in to this evergreen niche and provide your customers with top-tier lenses such as Olloclip lenses and Moment lenses. All these and many more can be found on Chinabrands. Where to sell: eBay, Amazon Suppliers: Chinabrands Those are some of the best things to buy and sell to make money fast. In fact items like vintage electronics and glassware are some of the best things to sell on eBay for profit. Where To Find The Best Things To Buy Cheap And Sell For Profit? There are numerous places where you can buy cheap items for reselling. Some of these places include: • Thrift stores • Flea markets • Websites • Garage sale • Yard sale • Your own house • Discount wholesalers What Are Some Selling Sites To Sell Your Things Online? Well, there are thousands of sites where you can sell your cheap items and make huge profits. Some include: • Auction sites such as eBay • Etsy which deals with more of vintage and handmade items • Local Flea markets • Craigslist • Have a yard sale • Amazon

There isn’t an easy answer to this question. Something that is popular today, may not be popular tomorrow.  The best advice I can offer you is to learn how to properly source products. A product sourcing tool like Algopix is great for this at it will show you a product’s demand level, competition, profit and expenses, how established your competition is, and other important metrics.  This data will help you weed out bad products and determine which ones are actually worth pursuing.  As a general rule of thumb, any products you sell should be:  - High quality to minimize returns - Consumable if you want return customers (think body products, creams, etc.) - Year long products. Avoid anything overly seasonal unless you want to sit on dead stock - Small and light if you want to reduce shipping costs - Easy to source from suppliers. Product shortages can lead to you losing your competitive edge.  Product sourcing is one of the most important steps an eCommerce store can master. If you can source profitable products for cheap, you can make a lot of profit and grow your store.
